Trade/Device Name(s): Glooko Device System for Glooko Logbook+ Application
Regulation Name(s): Calculator/data processing module for clinical use
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Web browser (Internet Explorer, Firefox, Chrome, Safari)
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Data download from compatible FDA-cleared blood glucose meters
Methodologies: Blood glucose data transfer and review
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Glooko Device System for Glooko Logbook+ Application, a data management platform for downloading and reviewing blood glucose readings from compatible meters to iOS devices.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use in home and professional settings to aid individuals with diabetes and healthcare professionals in review, analysis, and evaluation of blood glucose readings to support effective diabetes management; not for treatment decisions.
